disclaimer: Disclaimer: The following information is provided for informational purposes only and does not constitute professional architectural advice. Always consult with a certified architect or relevant professionals before making any decisions regarding construction or design.

rooms.description: Open-plan living space with Vastu-compliant orientation. Large windows for natural light and ventilation.
Integrated kitchen and dining area. Positioned in the east as per Vastu principles to promote energy flow.
Spacious master bedroom with attached bathroom on the west side for calm environment.
Second bedroom suitable for family members or guest use. Ideally located to maintain privacy and Vastu compliance.
Essential facilities on the ground floor for visitors.
Storage area with access to garden and pool region.

openings.description: Large entrance door ensuring ease of entry and Vastu alignment.
Multiple windows throughout for natural light, ventilation, and energy efficiency.
Access point to the swimming pool area with safety measures in place.

additional_features.description: Dedicated swimming pool on the ground floor accessible from living area. Designed keeping budget constraints and safety norms in mind.
Small balcony attached to the living area for natural light and garden view.
